Join Spines' Partnership Program: Elevate Your Professional Offering and Boost Your Earnings

Introduce authors to a seamless AI-powered journey from manuscript to global distribution across countless global channels, and earn commissions simply through referrals.

4.5
4.5
Apply Here

Empower Authors With The Future of Publishing

By becoming Spines’ partner, you play a pivotal role in revolutionizing the publishing industry, all while earning attractive commissions simply by referring your clients to publish with us.

Get Started Now

Type of Partners we Work with

Our partnership program at Spines is ideal for those integral to the author’s journey, offering significant value and opportunities to amplify their impact in the literary world. We welcome a diverse range of partners in the publishing field.

Why Partner with Spines?

Payment On Time

We prioritize your trust, ensuring reliable and prompt payments.

High - Quality Product

Our stellar Trustpilot ratings reflect our commitment to author satisfaction and industry-leading quality.

Detailed Dashboard

Effortlessly monitor and track your earnings with precision.

Dedicated Support

Our team is always available for personalized assistance and to answer any questions.

Global Reach

Regardless of your location, you can refer authors to us; we operate on a global scale.

Rewarding Commissions

Earn substantial commissions every time you direct your clients to our services.

Apply Here

Spines Testimonials

92%

satisfied with the production process

85%

says they will publish with us again

FAQ'S

How do I join Spines Partnership Program?

Simply fill out our application form, and we will contact you to talk and see if you’re a good fit!

How much can I earn as a partner?

With our most premium subscription, you can earn up to $200. We offer varied subscription options, including Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Yearly, and for every second book and beyond. Your earning potential grows with your efforts.

How are commissions tracked and paid?

We equip you with a unique link and code, ensuring every bit of traffic you generate is accounted for. Commissions are paid out 60 days after the first month to honor our 30-day money-back guarantee. It’s transparent and timely.

Are there any fees or costs associated with becoming a partner?

Joining our affiliate program is completely free, with no hidden costs or charges.

How can I track my earnings?

We provide you with access to an intuitive dashboard, where you can monitor your link’s performance and view your earnings.

What kind of support and resources will I receive?

As our partner, you’ll have dedicated customer support for any queries or concerns. Plus, we’ll supply all the necessary media resources to help you succeed. We’re here to support your growth.

How long do commissions last for?

Your commissions will last as long as your referred authors stay subscribed. For instance, if they remain with us for 5 years, you’ll earn commissions for those 5 years. It’s a partnership that rewards longevity.

How do I get paid?

After the first 60 days of a subscription, you’re eligible for payment. Withdrawals start at $150 and can be processed via bank wire or PayPal. It’s simple and straightforward to get your earnings.

Become a Partner
